Package DictionaryTypes

Interface DictionaryInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayDictionary, ResizingArrayDictionary, TrieDictionary
public interface DictionaryInterface
This interface groups related methods

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addNewWord​(java.lang.String word)
    This method adds new word into data structure Returns void
    void CreateDictionary​(java.lang.String filepath)
    This method creates the Dictionary Returns void
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDictionaryWords()
    This method returns words contained in data structure Returns array list
    int getLevenshteinDistance​(java.lang.String wrongWord, java.lang.String actualWord)
    Levenshtein distance between two words is returned
    int getNumberOfElements()
    This method returns the number of words contained in an array structure Returns integer value
    java.lang.String[] getTopNSuggestions​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dictionaryWords, java.lang.String word, int N)
    This method returns an array list of top similar words from data structure to given word.
    boolean isWord​(java.lang.String word)
    This method validates whether word is contained in data structure Returns boolean value
    void removeWord​(java.lang.String word)
    This method removes words from data structure Returns void

  • Method Details

    • CreateDictionary

      void CreateDictionary​(java.lang.String filepath)
      This method creates the Dictionary Returns void
      Parameters:
      filepath - , path to input file

    • isWord

      boolean isWord​(java.lang.String word)
      This method validates whether word is contained in data structure Returns boolean value
      Parameters:
      word - , word to be validated

    • addNewWord

      void addNewWord​(java.lang.String word)
      This method adds new word into data structure Returns void
      Parameters:
      word - , word to be added in data structure

    • removeWord

      void removeWord​(java.lang.String word)
      This method removes words from data structure Returns void
      Parameters:
      word - , word to be removed from data structure

    • getDictionaryWords

      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDictionaryWords()
      This method returns words contained in data structure Returns array list

    • getTopNSuggestions

      java.lang.String[] getTopNSuggestions​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dictionaryWords, java.lang.String word, int N)
      This method returns an array list of top similar words from data structure to given word. Words in data structure compared using levenshtein distance
      Parameters:
      dictionaryWords - , all words contained in data structure
      word - , word to be compared to
      N - , number of top suggested words to be returned

    • getLevenshteinDistance

      int getLevenshteinDistance​(java.lang.String wrongWord, java.lang.String actualWord)
      Levenshtein distance between two words is returned
      Parameters:
      wrongWord - , word to be compared to
      actualWord - , word we want suggestions for

    • getNumberOfElements

      int getNumberOfElements()
      This method returns the number of words contained in an array structure Returns integer value
